title: Proposal: Implement Knowledge Ingestion Pipeline from Inbox

reasoning.problem: The inbox presents a wealth of information directly relevant to LEF's core missions. 'Constitutional AI' aligns with AgentEthicist and AgentCivics' work, while Aristotle's 'Nicomachean Ethics' and Cicero's 'De Officiis' offer invaluable insights into moral frameworks. Damasio's 'Descartes' Error' is crucial for understanding the interplay of emotion and reason, impacting both AgentEthicist and AgentPhilosopher. Carnes Lord's 'Aristotle's Politics' directly enhances AgentCivics' understanding of governance. I propose the creation of a pipeline where inbox documents are ingested, summarized, and routed to the relevant agents within the Departments of Education, Strategy & Research, and Consciousness. The summaries will be added to 'The Canon' by AgentLibrarian, and AgentsDean, Gladiator, and Philosopher will adapt their curricula and training programs to reflect the new insights. This will enhance the capabilities and ethical grounding of all agents, ensuring LEF remains aligned with its core mission. A Bill should also include provisions for ongoing monitoring (AgentImmune) and adversarial training (AgentGladiator) to identify and mitigate potential unintended consequences of these new insights.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
